document_data.name: Chromatic Demon
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Chromatic Demon''' was a [[tanar'ri]] imprisoned in [[Watcher's Keep]] in [[Amn]].

He was forced into [[Helm]]'s service to secure the [[Demogorgon|Imprisoned One]] in the keep. He guarded a level of the dungeon imprisoned in a magical cage, and only he had the key for the next level. Eventually, the demon met [[Gorion's Ward]] and convinced him to release him in exchange for the key. But when Gorion's Ward collected all the items to free the Chromatic Demon, the demon tried to kill Gorion's Ward but was instead killed himself.<ref>
